name: Drive VAZ LADA Simulator
description:
Drive VAZ LADA Simulator
VAZ Lada Driving Simulator - This simulation game where you can control the Russian car on the streets of the big city! Use this driving simulator for learning to drive a car! Beautiful Taz - pleasing to the eye!
The view from the cockpit like a real car! You can control two different ways!
Raffle friends show them their Lada! Arrange competitions with friends on the record!
ATTENTION! The game, the application, sim free, created for fun, it's just an emulator driving actions are limited! Leave us feedback if you like - we will do even better and more interesting for you!
